title: Pre Leasing for Fall! Furnished Studio by UW & Free Internet
posting_body: 5043 BROOKLYN AVE NE UNIT 202 | SEATTLE, WA 98105
The Den Apartments - Seattle Property Management Associates
Furnished Studios  - Live In Your Own Space
Welcome to The Den on Brooklyn.
A NEWER green apartment building on Brooklyn and 52nd Street within walking distance of the University of Washington.
The Den features furnished loft style studios at $950 per month plus $75 per month utility fee per person.
The Den on Brooklyn is a newer apartment building in the heart of the University District.

Extra large windows, Natural lighting, Walk to University of Washington campus, Energy efficient appliances, Low VOC paints and adhesives, Access to community transit and walk to light rail, Increased insulation, 10' ceilings

Furnished apartments, Bamboo flooring, Kitchenette with Microwave Convection Oven and built in Cooktop, Granite counters, Loft style beds, Internet provided, Controlled Access building, Cats accepted, and Laundry facilities on site
